title: Streaming video app lets fans see stars’ daily lives
text: All-female band Girls’ Generation dances along to their song “Lion Heart” on their broadcast. [Screen shots] Hyolyn, left, and Soyou, two members of the girl group Sistar, streamed a live video they took while doing karaoke, where they showed off their singing abilities. [Screen shots] Actress Park Bo-young introduces her on-screen sweetheart, Cho Jung-seok, in Naver’s V app. [Screen shots] Korea takes bronze twice in soft tennis after back-to-back losses to Japan Korean kabaddi teams end Games empty-handed and out of breath Oriental Brewery increases beer prices as expenses escalate Tightening the safety belt Negative reaction To write comments, please log in to one of the accounts.
